document_data.mainbody:
Nuthkhals Way was a curved street that ran from the Eastway district of Baldurs Gate to its southernmost city gate â€“ the Cliffgate.
Nuthkhals Way began just north of the Manycoins House, passing to the west from it, curving south, crossing Stormshore Street and eventually reaching the Cliffgate.
*Eastway Expeditions on the crossing of Hammaskarls Ride and Nuthkhals Way, a shop that specialized in exploration equipment, particularly sold to adventurers en route to the Chultan Peninsula in the late 15 century DR.
*Manycoins House, the office of the Merchants League and a temple dedicated to Waukeen.
*Garmults House of Mastery, a martial arts and combat skills academy and a social club in the late 15 century DR.
*Harborside Hospital, in the 14 century DR, the building was known as Scarbradros Haven.
